registrationHint: To successfully register confirm the registration with the code sent to your email
passwordRecoveryHint: Enter the code from the email or follow the link sent to your email then you can assign yourself a new password.
userRegistrationHint: To start working together with your colleagues register the first user
passwordWarning: The password must consist of at least 6 characters, contain letters of different registers and numbers.
companyRegistrationHint: To start working together with your colleagues you need to add your company
inviteEmployeesHint: To start collaborating with your colleagues invite them via email
passwordRecoveryEmailHint: Enter the email you provided when registering to receive the link and the password reset code.
wrongPasswordAlert: Can't log in. Please check your login and password.
